name: Masters Of Havoc
description:
This game is made for FireTruck Game Jam 2017 with the theme "You are villian".

When denied entry into the Master Race. Our Villian makes a nefarious plan to capture a planet and destroy all its population to show his dominance. Will he be successful in his plans. Play and find out.

Please have a look at Help Menu in-game before starting game.

I hope you like it :)

Credits-

Environment Models, UI, Fonts by Kenney.

Turret models downloaded from DevAssets powered by Brackeys.

Sound by Roald Strauss.

Master Raiden sprite by Justin Nichol
